net.sourceforge.earticleast.app
Class ASTArticleChangeMethodVisibility.CompareTypeSearchRequestor

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jdt.core.search.SearchRequestor
      net.sourceforge.earticleast.app.ASTArticleChangeMethodVisibility.CompareTypeSearchRequestor
Enclosing class:
ASTArticleChangeMethodVisibility
private static final class ASTArticleChangeMethodVisibility.CompareTypeSearchRequestor
extends org.eclipse.jdt.core.search.SearchRequestor

An instance of this class is passed to the Search Engine to promote search matches. Matches have the type "reference to a method". For every match, this class checks whether the reference is from outside the type the method is declared within.

Project page: http://earticleast.sourceforge.net

Author:
Thomas Kuhn
